section.name: Reactor Template
section.source:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" ?> <project name="reactor" xmlns:x="antlib:org.apache.avalon.tools">
<x:home/>
<target name="init"> <x:reactor target="init"/> </target>
<target name="clean"> <x:reactor target="clean"/> </target>
<target name="prepare"> <x:reactor target="prepare"/> </target>
<target name="build"> <x:reactor target="build"/> </target>
<target name="package"> <x:reactor target="package"/> </target>
<target name="test"> <x:reactor target="test"/> </target>
<target name="install"> <x:reactor target="install"/> </target>
<target name="default"> <x:reactor/> </target>
</project>
